ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Canon EF 24-70mm f/4 L IS Lens + <3> Canon 2400 DSLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> Battery Grip for Canon 6D +
<7> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <8> 77mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter + <9> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <10> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower +
<11> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-70mm f/4L IS USM Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Grip + Case + 3 (UV/FLD/CPL) Filters + Accessory Kit
